channel.title: [Language: C] Grabbing the date;
channel.description:
I'm making an app for my Boy Scouts Troop.
I'm making this one feature when on a certain day everyone with the app will get a notice of an upcoming event if they had forgotten or didn't know about it.
How would I grab the date without having hundreds of lines of code in the app? If you don't understand, sorry. Let me know and I'll try to explain better.
~Sibor

item.title: [Language: C] Grabbing the date;
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

http://www.cplusplus.com/reference/ctime/

Code snippits are there as well.

Read full topic
